greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Permutation of natural numbers: a(1) = 1, a(n) = A246278(a(A055396(n)),A078898(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..3432
Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
formula: a(p_n) = p_{a(n)}, or equally, a(n) = A049084(a(A000040(n))). [Restriction to primes induces the same sequence].
A078442(a(n)) = A078442(n), A049076(a(n)) = A049076(n). [Preserves the "order of primeness of n"].
program: (Scheme, with memoizing-macro definec from _Antti Karttunen_'s IntSeq-library)
(definec (A250248 n) (cond ((<= n 1) n) (else (A246278bi (A250248 (A055396 n)) (A078898 n))))) ;; Code for A246278bi given in A246278
xref: Similar permutations: A250250 for even more recursed variant of A249818.
Differs from the "vanilla version" A249818 for the first time at n=73, where a(73) = 108, while A249818(73) = 73.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 17 2014
